wikipedia_page.main: Henry Nixon (1874 – 15 March 1939) was a British steelworker, trade unionist and politician. He was General President of the National Union of Blastfurnacemen, Cokeworkers, Ironstone Miners, and Kindred Trades and served briefly in Parliament representing the Labour Party.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1923 United Kingdom general election

response: Henry Nixon is an Australian actor.
